item.description:
We are blessed to have so much "natural" beauty in our New England backyard that's free for us to enjoy.

David S, BostonLOA member, who lives in Winchester is looking forward to be our hiking guide. Come enjoy the beauty of the Middlesex Fells. Our hike will take us along the north side of the north reservoir to a lookout tower with a beautiful view of the city, the coastline...

Time: 4 - 6 pm
**Plan to arrive by 3:50 pm. We start hiking at 4 pm.

Agenda:
- Hike: Easy ( 4 - 5:15 pm)

- LOA activities: (5:15 - 6 pm)


Meeting Place: at the grassy area of the grounds of a condo building ( tennis court & park benches) between Appalachian Rd & Reservoir St
(1) Go to Google Maps: http://maps.google.co...
(2) Click on link: Get Directions".
(3) Copy/paste "Appalachian Rd, Winchester, MA 01890" into "A" box.
(4) Copy/paste "Reservoir St, Winchester, MA 01890" into "B" box.
(5) Click on "Get Directions" button.
(6) See roads display on map on right of screen

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Come for a HIKE & enjoy the abundance of beauty with each other
